title: Sulfur vacancy induced radical generation in ZnIn2S4 for lignin photocatalytic Cα–Cβ cleavage
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4496-4506
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00741G, Paper
Jifang Zhang, Jinde Sun, Chengcheng Suo, Wei Li, Sha Luo, Bing Tian, Chunhui Ma, Shouxin Liu
The synthesized ZIS-Sv was formed by the self-assembly of 2D nanosheets. Introduction of Sv has promoted electron adsortion and ˙O2− generation to cleave Cα–Cβ bond, finally. This is a cyclic indirect oxidation process.
